?

How do I start working with Pink Tiger?

Click the Apply button below to submit an application. We will reach out to schedule a call with you within 48 hours to better understand your needs & goals and see if we're a good fit.

?

Who has access to my content? Is it safe?

Once approved, you'll get a dedicated account manager specific to your needs as a creator. Only you and your agent will have access to your account and content.

?

I'm new to OF, will I still be considered?

Our ideal creator is someone who has tried OnlyFans before but were unable to reach the success that they wanted on the platform. That said, we're open to working with anyone! Apply below and we'll be in touch.

?

How much do you charge?

After doing a free audit of your account, we will create a custom plan to help you achieve your goals as effeciently as possible. Contact us for more info.
